spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting (Psionics)
headerEntries: The duergar despot's innate spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save {@dc 12}). It can cast the following spells, requiring no components:

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The duergar has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Psychic Engine
entries: When the duergar despot suffers a critical hit or is reduced to 0 hit points, psychic energy erupts from its frame to deal 14 ({@damage 4d6}) psychic damage to each creature within 5 feet of it.

trait.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
entries: While in sunlight, the duergar despot has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on sight.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The despot makes two iron fist attacks and two stomping foot attacks. It can replace up to four of these attacks with uses of its Flame Jet.

action.name: Iron Fist
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}14 ({@damage 2d8 + 5}) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it must make a successful {@dc 17} Strength saving throw or be thrown up to 30 feet away in a straight line. The target is knocked {@condition prone} and then takes 10 ({@damage 3d6}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Stomping Foot
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d8 + 5}) bludgeoning damage, or 18 ({@damage 3d8 + 5}) bludgeoning damage to a {@condition prone} target.

action.name: Flame Jet
entries: The duergar spews flames in a line 100 feet long and 5 feet wide. Each creature in the line must make a {@dc 16} Dexterity saving throw, taking 18 ({@damage 4d8}) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
